if I'm selling coats again and I want to be able to like forecast how many coats
I need I will sell in the next month say say on a particular date Jan 30 I can
get my p90 number and that will basically give me the high-end of how many coats that I am likely to sell so

reason why that matters to me see as Amazon or any other retailer is that you really want to have enough stock to
